item.title: Black and White
item.description: A journey into monochrome. This collection strips away color to focus on the raw essence of form, texture, and the play of light. From high-contrast urban scenes to subtle tonal gradations in nature, these images explore the timeless emotional depth of black and white photography.

item.title: Professional Services
item.description:
With over 15 years of industry experience, I offer specialized services across the digital production pipeline.

Visual Effects & 3D Animation

  • Custom VFX Creation: High-quality visual effects for film, TV, and commercials.
  • 3D Modeling & Animation: Character, environment, and prop creation.
  • Compositing: Sophisticated multi-layered compositing and technical direction.

Photogrammetry

  • 3D Scanning: Detailed scanning of objects and environments for digital assets.
  • Virtual Set Creation: High-fidelity scans for use in Unreal Engine and other real-time environments.
  • Cultural Heritage Preservation: Accurate digital documentation of historical sites and artifacts.

Motion Design

  • Title Sequences: Creative opening and closing credits for film and TV.
  • UI/UX Animation: Designing and animating user interfaces for digital products and films.

Consulting & Training

  • VFX Pipeline Consulting: Streamlining studio workflows for efficiency.
  • Workshops & Training: Technical workshops on 3D animation, photogrammetry, and Generative AI.

item.title: Showreel
item.description:
About the Reel

This showreel represents some of the visual effects work I’ve been fortunate to contribute to over the years. It includes shots from various projects where I played different roles, including some work on Star Trek Into Darkness and Game of Thrones.

You’ll see full CG animations from films like 2012 and U900, where I worked on elements such as shading, lighting, and FX. I also had the chance to create set extensions and matte paintings for movies including The Ghostwriter and Hotel Lux.

item.title: About Seb Hirsch
item.description:
Seb Hirsch

I am a multifaceted professional with extensive experience in academia, visual effects (VFX), motion design, generative AI, and 3D animation.

Currently, I serve as a Professor for Time-Based Media and 3D Animation at Media University (formerly HMKW). My academic work focus is on the intersection of technology and creativity, preparing the next generation of digital artists.

Industry Background

My professional journey includes work on major international productions. In 2012, I was part of the team recognized with a Primetime Emmy Award for outstanding visual effects on Game of Thrones (Season 2).

item.title: Star Trek Into Darkness
item.description:
Contributed as a Matte Painter at Pixomondo for the 2013 blockbuster Star Trek Into Darkness.

The work involved creating large-scale futuristic environments and set extensions, blending digital painting with 3D elements to define the visual scape of the J.J. Abrams sequel.

item.title: Game of Thrones
item.description:
Sebastian worked as a VFX/Environment Artist at Pixomondo for the acclaimed HBO series Game of Thrones.

He was part of the talented team recognized with a Primetime Emmy Award in 2012 for Outstanding Special Visual Effects for Season 2. His work involved creating complex digital environments and seamless integration to bring the world of Westeros to life.

item.title: The Avengers
item.description:
Served as a Senior Lighting and Shading Artist at Scanline VFX, contributing to the complex digital environments of the Marvel blockbuster The Avengers (2012).

The project required precise shading and lighting of digital assets to integrate perfectly with live-action footage during the intense battle sequences.

This involved a digital recreation of the Berlin Olympic Stadium filled with 90,000 computer-generated characters for extensive set extensions.
